website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ MH680 projector offers 1080p (1,920-by-1,080) resolution with near-excellent quality for data images. It's a solid choice if you need to show fine detail in your data presentations.

customer_reviews.title: Handshakes a problem but awesome projector .
customer_reviews.text: Really a great projector but does not appear to be HDCP compatible. For home theater purposes, it didn't handshake with a receiver' s. Main HDMI output. It worked wonderfully with individual HDMI feeds plugged into it, has a great picture, bright clean, and the speakers even were loud enogh for covering a small room well. Contacted Benq and Pioneer about the issues. Both said it was a fluke and Benq suggested an MH 630, which I have swapped to try. Hopefully will handle this.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Balmer Sr.

customer_reviews.title: BenQ for Home Theater
customer_reviews.text: This projector is advertised as a business projector but, I wanted to try it for HT. I have put over 50 hours on the unit and the picture quality is exceptionally great. Vibrant colors, clear and detailed images. No, I repeat, no rainbow artifacts. The only complaint is the HDMI source seeking is slow. This could be a handshake issue with the avr, I am not sure. If you are looking for a home projector for HT, I can highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: derrickdj1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Projector that beats its competition on performance, features and price.
customer_reviews.text: Very Good Projector. Really beats it competitors on features and performance at this price. Replaced a decade old projector for my company. Fast startup and crystal clear picture. Good connectivity to almost any device. I can easily recommend this for others.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: this is noiseless and far superior picture clarity
customer_reviews.text: Clear hi def even with high ambient light. Used mostly for gaming and movies on a 120 inch screen with 14 foot throw. I have not been able to get the 3d glasses to work with it, but have not really tried. Compared to our last projector, which was state of the art in 2007, this is noiseless and far superior picture clarity.
customer_reviews.author: 737NG

customer_reviews.title: This is a great projector, we use it as a portable projector ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great projector, we use it as a portable projector that our students can check out and it just works.
customer_reviews.author: nathanb

customer_reviews.title: Great image quality!
customer_reviews.text: It's been a great workhorse. Great image quality. Perfect of our training room.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy an amazing picture quality (sharpness and colors) compared to ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy an amazing picture quality (sharpness and colors) compared to the previous Benq projector in low definition. Another significant benefit is the large picture size you can get with the projector at a short distance from the screen (4m or little less). This is especially appropriate for a small room used as a home theater.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques B.

customer_reviews.title: Left hanging - And can't do much about it. Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: This unit blanked out on the first project that I used it on. Might have gotten a replacement of the same product but couldn't replace it because of the 30 day police. Left hanging - but can't do much about it. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie C Rainey

customer_reviews.title: BenQ MH680 1080P DLP 3D Projector is unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I have had this BenQ MH680 1080P DLP 3D Projector more than a year, and rarely used it; however, last week it became unstable. This projector turned off every 2-3 minutes. I have reset it a few times but the problem was still existed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but so far I like the image that makes very good quality looks
customer_reviews.text: still testing it, but so far I like the image that makes very good quality looks, it's also very simple to learn and use
customer_reviews.author: Mariela Belett

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector is nothing short of awesome the picture rivals my Samsung LED TV very easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: I love this projector
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector. :-) the picture is aweome for the price. However, make sure you have the correct size screen. I had to up size to the 120.
customer_reviews.author: Trenton O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, wireless option could be better
customer_reviews.text: The best projector in Hd for the money. Awesome picture and great features. Only one complaint. The wireless capabilities, is not quite as easy as made out to be. You have to purchase a benq specific wireless dongle that's like 50 bucks so it will work. It has to be the benq one though, other ones on here won't work in my experience. Great projector though.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: HD quality very good, sound quality good, 3D quality good
customer_reviews.author: mehmet resid onen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great picture, bright colors! I use it for movies, and TV, looks just as clear as my 42" HD!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best projector
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best!! I installed this unit for a church to project a live event in an overflow room. The signal is from a Canon professional HDMI video camera 100ft away. The projector display seem so real whit the color saturation and depth of field very very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Widerman

customer_reviews.title: It was a very good projector. But I have some troubles with the ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a very good projector. But I have some troubles with the yellow and orange colors. They are very diferent from the display screen. But the rest is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Beto

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Projector, 1080p is the best, now that is all I want to use.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet Projector, 1080p is the best, now that is all I want to use. I use this for PP presentations and it looks much better than XGA, WXGA, etc..
customer_reviews.author: Gordon K. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for presentations, not good for movies.
customer_reviews.text: This is a projector meant for presentations in an office or school. This model is not suitable for movies. The "rainbow effect" is VERY noticeable when watching movies. I tried this model out with my PS3 and Wii U and it did okay displaying video games in 1080p. If you're looking for a home theater projector to watch movies, I would spend the extra money and go with the BenQ HT1075. I ended up returning the MH680 (got headaches after 5-10 minutes of use watching movies) and got the HT1075 instead.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Jung

customer_reviews.title: but this machine gives us a nice view.
customer_reviews.text: sorry to manual option and not supported wireless movie play function. but this machine gives us a nice view.
customer_reviews.author: MYUNGYONG SUH

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a backup but made it our primary unit
customer_reviews.text: I got this because we needed a 2nd unit, after we used it on test we decided to make it our primary unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BenQ mh680 is great.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect projector for me, which is replaced the 10 year old Sharp 10R. I dont have to modify the old location rack. It also has 1920 resolution, which have enough clarity colorfull picture to read the whole CNN, google news pages on the wall. However, the usb reader is slow, if it is compared with computer. I didnot have a chance to explore 3d and wireless capabilities yet.
customer_reviews.author: SR_Gadgets

customer_reviews.title: hdmi not working.
customer_reviews.text: buy two, and both have the hdmi not working. I'm traing to return it but was imposible. Where or who to call or write?
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Clarity for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to use indoors on a home theater screen, it is AMAZING the picture quality is absolutely stunning. It is comparable to a night out at a HD Movietheater but without spending $20 a ticket. It has connections on the back so you can hook it up to external speakers. It has multiple input and output jacks for almost any medium. This product is amazing for indoors and awesome for outdoor use as well. We set up a outdoor screen about 10 feet long by 4 feet wide and this little monster projected a clear HD picture onto the screen. Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

product_meta.title: BenQ MH680 1080P DLP 3D Projector,Black
product_meta.description:
BENQ MH680 1080P DLP 3D PROJECTOR
Supports multiple video formats, giving you the flexibility to present with full HD quality.View larger With a focused and clean image quality, presentations are easy to read and highly effective.View larger ENJOY PREMIUM IMAGE PERFORMANCE
Featuring a Full HD native resolution, a brightness of 3000 ANSI lumens and a high contrast ratio of 10000:1, the cost-effective BenQ MH680 projector offers a stunning full-screen presentation with the finest details regardless of the ambient light level.

SAVING MORE ON POWER CONSUMPTION WITH BENQ'S SMARTECO TECHNOLOGY
Offering lower TCO and optimized projection through dynamic power saving, uncompromised brightness, exquisite picture quality and optimized lamp life--SmartEco technology has perfected what a DLP projector can do. With this innovation, schools and corporations are able to save up to 70% of lamp power consumption and lower maintenance costs through dynamic power saving features while bringing an ultra-vivid viewing experience into every presentation. SmartEco technologies in the MH680 include Eco Blank Mode, No Source Detected Mode, and Auto Power Off.

PREMIUM FULL HD 1080P RESOLUTION
With the BenQ MH680, business presentations will never look the same. The MH680 supports multiple video formats including 480p, 576p, 720p, 1080i and 1080p--giving you the flexibility to present in the latest video formats with Full HD quality. The BenQ MH680 sets a new standard of video presentation that delivers 5X more detail than traditional 480p projectors. BenQ MH680 is built with latest DLP technology to support 3D functionality, allowing schools to bring an immersive learning experience to their students with a simple preparation of 3D glasses and 3D content from your Blu-ray player.

RAZOR-SHARP CLARITY WITH ULTRA-READABILITY
Enabling a 96% fill factor, DLP Technology supplies pixel circuitry behind the pixel, thereby eliminating the thick dark bezels around individual pixels, which diminish color and detail. A higher fill factor and less black border translate to noticeably purer, more intense color and smoother image quality. BenQ DLP Projectors also feature high contrast ratios for flawless rendering of small text, fine lines, and dark scene details. Blacks are deeper and overall image quality is more focused and clean. Your presentations will be easily readable and highly effective, even from the back row of a well-lit venue.

BenQ MH680 projector with Colorific technology.View larger THE BENQ BENEFIT
 * Accurate. Over 1 billion colors--compared to 16.7 million from many LCD projectors 
 * Crisp. Bright, high contrast picture--3x more contrast than similar top-selling LCD models 
 * Long-Lasting. Consistent quality--image is the same now and years from now 
 * Projector featuring Full HD 1080p Resolution 
 * Blu-ray Full HD 3D supported 
 * Wireless display (with Wi-Fi dongle, not included) 
 * USB 2.0 port for connecting flash drives 
 * World-leading SmartEco technology

COLORIFIC TECHNOLOGY DELIVERS LIFELIKE COLOR, YEAR AFTER YEAR
BenQ uses Colorific technology to optimize images for specific color balance effects for diverse applications such as presentations, movies and spreadsheets and photographs. Every BenQ Colorific projector generates more than one billion colors by combining up to seven different colors to create vibrant, true to life images. You'll also experience dramatic contrasts for remarkable clarity, higher impact, and greater legibility. BenQ's Colorific projectors are dependable year after year. You can rely on the colors to remain the same from day one to a decade later--without the risk of fading, ghosted images, or yellowing.

Projection Perfect for Every OccasionMH680MH740World-Leading SmartEco Technology✓✓Full HD (1920x1080) Native Resolution✓✓Blu-ray Full HD 3D Supported✓✓Wireless Display✓USB Reader✓LAN Control✓1.5x Big Zoom Ratio✓Dual HDMI Connectivity✓

By pressing Quick Install key on the remote control, installer can quickly access to installation related functions in the OSD menu
